title: Buttering the Shoe
itunes:title: Buttering the Shoe
description:
Kate’s at wedding weekend and wants to bitch about construction noise. Jacqueline has settled into saying ciao and scusa. The remains of going to the ice machine and donning the second mask. Women who once said no to Kate. The crone whore at the wedding. Engage the elders. Kate has a heated exchange at LAX and loves it. The pressure to be enchanted by the child. Marion Parke heels.

.

.

.

.

.

This episode was edited and engineered by C. Tweedie.
